summary: What if the most chilling novel of all time was actually based on account of a horrific experiment gone awry?
cast: Joe Egender|Haydyn Foster|Brian Henderson|Luke Geissbuhler|Christine Lakin|Kris Lemche|Roger W. Morrissey|Timothy V. Murphy|Heather Stephens|Dawn Wiercinski|Leland White|Eric Zuckerman
title: The Frankenstein Theory
